0.title: AI: Probabilistic Reasoning

3.title: Instructor
3.content: Mary Anne Smart she/her . msmart@ucsd.edu Lecture: MTuWTh 2-3:20PM, Warren Lecture Hall 2111 . Mary Anne Smart is a sixth year PhD candidate in CSE. After working as a TA for various CSE courses, Mary Anne is excited to be teaching CSE 150A as the instructor-of-record for the first time this summer.

4.title: Staff
4.content: TA Rishikanth Chandrasekaran he/him . r3chandr@eng.ucsd.edu . Coming soon 👀 . Tutor Weiyue Li he/him . wel019@ucsd.edu . Hello! I am an incoming 4th-year student in Data Science. I am excited about tutoring this class because I am passionate about learning about AI, and I am currently collaborating on a VLM and LLM project. Please reach out to me if you have any questions! . Tutor Aaron Liu he/him . aal006@ucsd.edu . Hi, I’m Aaron, I’ve just finished my second year of undergrad as a Computer Science major. My main interests are in deep learning and artificial intelligence and outside of school I like to bike and play soccer.
